title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 16-B - Order for certified copy of adoption order (after sealing of records)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 16-B - Order for certified copy of adoption order (after sealing of records)

State Regulations
D.R.L. ยง 114 Form 16-B
(Order for Certified

Copy of Adoption

Order - After sealing
of records)
12/97

At a term of the Surrogate's Court of
the

State of New York, held in and for
the

County of, at, New York
on, 19
PRESENT
Hon. Judge
________
In the matter of the Adoption of
(Docket)(File) No. ORDER FOR
A Minor of the Age of years CERTIFIED COPY
OF
ADOPTION ORDER
(After sealing of records)
________
UPON reading and filing the application of
and
duly verified the day of, 19, requesting
this Court to issue an order authorizing the Clerk of the Court of the County
of to prepare, certify and deliver to said applicant(s) a copy of the original
order of adoption granted herein; and the Court being satisfied that there is
good and proper cause for granting such request; and upon all of the
proceedings had herein; it is
ORDERED that the Clerk of the Court of the

County of be and (s)he hereby is authorized to prepare, certify and deliver to
said applicant(s) a copy of the original order of adoption granted
herein. ENTER
______________
Surrogate

Dated: Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form
16-B
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
